<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mask of Uncanny Breath](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2326)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 150 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A thin wooden mask carved in the shape of a skull, monstrous face, or eerily featureless visage, a mask of uncanny breath fully covers your face. While wearing it, each breath you take feels cool and pure, perfectly flowing to feed your qi. You gain resistance 10 to [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) and can breathe in an airless or toxic environment. When you breathe in, fragments of bizarre knowledge flow through you, granting you a +2 item bonus to [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You gain 1 Focus Point, which you can use only to cast an [occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120) monk qi spell. If not used by the end of your turn, this Focus Point is lost.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** Your [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) Strike hits a creature that breathes;  **Effect** The mask contorts and inhales, sucking breath from your target's lungs. The target falls [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) but doesn't fall [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) or drop what it's holding. It wakes up at the end of your turn if it hasn't been woken up already.

**Craft Requirements** You are a [monk](/Classes.aspx?ID=8) with occult qi spells.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
